wikipedia_page.main: Frank Powell was an English football manager who coached the Chilean national team at the 1928 Summer Olympics. In the consolation final of the tournament, Chile drew 2-2 with the Netherlands, who were declared the winners after drawing lots.

response: *Cecil Frank Powell (1903–1969), British physicist and Nobel laureate in physics
*Frank Powell (1877–?), Canadian stage and silent film actor, screenwriter, and director
